page.title: 18Games Children Play
page.content:
Mother in kitchen doing a bit of knitting.In came a burglar and knocked her out.
What you have to do when they get to the bit that goes (in comes the burglar) another person jumps in and when they say (and knocks her out ) the person goes out and you start again.
I'm a tex,I'm a tex,I'm a texas girl. I live in the mountains far away. I can ride.I can shoot.I can swing a lasso.Where the cowboys meet in town. There's a guy over there and he winks one eye.He said that he loved me but he told a lie.His hair don't curl and his shoes don't shine.He aint got the money .So he aint mine.
Pupils-Henwick School,Thomas More School and Christchurch School.
